sources.title: Hi De Ho (1947)
sources.description: Cab Calloway plays himself in a plot about jealousy, night clubs, and gangsters. Ends with a series of musical numbers. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/hi-de-ho-1947/

sources.title: Hi De Ho (1947) Cab Calloway, Ida James, Jeni Le Gon | Musical Movie
sources.description:
Cab Calloway plays himself in a plot about jealousy, night clubs, and gangsters. Ends with a series of musical numbers.

Original title:  Hi De Ho (1947) 

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/umgE1eh8_3k


This film is available with subtitles in many language options.
Director: Josh Binney
Writer: Hal Seeger
Stars: Cab Calloway, Ida James, Jeni Le Gon
Genres: Classics, Musical


00:00 Full Movie
01:27 A dramatic story of love, betrayal, and ambition unfolds in a jazz club.
13:28 A tense and dramatic story unfolds in a jazz club, involving love, rivalry, and business negotiations.
25:58 A dramatic and eventful wedding ceremony takes place, with a near-death experience and a surprise marriage announcement.


@CultCinemaClassics Members-only videos https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

metadata.Plot: Bandleader Cab Calloway is tiring of his sexy girlfriend Minnie, who in turn is jealous of Cab's manager Nettie. When Nettie gets Cab a job at the Brass Hat Club, Minnie retaliates for his imagined infidelity by setting gangster Boss Mason, owner of a rival club, against him. Will she regret her action before it's too late? (This plot resolves halfway through the film; the rest is a series of 'soundies' featuring the Calloway band's inimitable jive). All-black cast.
metadata.Actors: Cab Calloway, Ida James, Jeni Le Gon
